account_count_total.description: Total number of accounts under the product.

account_count_delinquent.description: Total number of delinquent accounts under the product.

total_credit_issued_cents.description: Total amount (in cents) of credit issued to accounts under the product.

utilization_rate.description: The percent utilization rate of the product.

product_id.description: The Canopy-generated ID for the product.

effective_as_of_date.description: The `Date-Time` you would like the system to return the data as of. IE "tell me what the product information was as if I had asked on `2020-01-20 00:00:00 EST`". If empty defaults to current time.
